alert.note: Alert for Finney; Hamilton; Hodgeman; Kearny; Pawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 3:40AM CST until January 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Hamilton, Finney, Hodgeman, Pawnee and Kearny Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST /11 AM MST/ today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
